byline.contributor: Michael D. Shear reported from West Palm Beach, and James Glanz from New York. David E. Sanger contributed reporting from Washington, William J. Broad from New York and Andrew Higgins from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: A Twitter post from the president-elect appeared to suggest an end to decades of bipartisan efforts to limit nuclear weapons.
